HP Printer Setup Guide

Welcome to the step-by-step guide for setting up your HP printer!

How to Download HP Driver for MAC

Follow these steps to download and install HP drivers for your MAC device:

  1. Open the browser on your MAC device.
  2. Go to 123.hp.com/setup.
  3. Enter the model number of your printer.
  4. Download the compatible driver from the site.
  5. Open the HP Smart App (Install it if you don't have it).
  6. Follow the instructions in the app to add the printer.
  7. Run the downloaded driver file.
  8. Accept the terms and conditions and complete the installation process.

How to Install HP Driver in Mac

Steps to install the HP driver on your Mac:

  1. Open a web browser on your Mac system.
  2. Go to the official HP website.
  3. Select the model of your HP printer.
  4. Click on the "Download" button next to HP Easy Start.
  5. Double-click the downloaded file and follow on-screen instructions.
  6. Finish the installation process by completing the HP Installer setup.

Setup and Installation of HP Printer

Follow these steps for setting up your HP printer:

  1. Unbox the printer and remove all packaging material.
  2. Place the printer on a flat surface.
  3. Install the ink cartridges and load paper into the printer tray.
  4. Connect the printer to the power cord and turn it ON.
  5. Visit 123.hp.com/setup to download the drivers.
  6. Follow the setup instructions provided on the website.
